title: Can't log in... I
body: I got in a game... had to restart the game and the server won't let me log in......

replies.body:
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na 

guys there's a message from the all-knowing ones

> [{quoted}](name=PainRinenngan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fjM0ZPRv,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-10-06T00:23:49.837+0000)
>
> http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na 
> 
> guys there's a message from the all-knowing ones

Lol riot, calling it a delay like they gonna fix it in a few minutes. Dbl lift like confidence, gl rito.

I read the word delay just now and genuinely laughed. It's not a "delay" if you can't login at all.

I mean I guess i'm delayed by hours.....

The account login does not connect after 3 retries.  Have tried rebooting my router, my computer, and running a DNS flush.  Nothing working so far.  Internet browsing works fine now.  There were some severe problems earlier in my location (central Texas).   I have also tried using my cell phone as a mobile hot spot.  Still cannot login.

Right there with you man my buddy was sitting right next to me in the ranked game we where in and i could NOT LOG IN. I sat there for 20 minutes flushing dns makeing sure all the things that the support forums tell you to do where done. Trying peoples little backwards magic trick ideas that rarly work but just in case. And in the end guess what counted as a loss for my freind and about lets say not even 6 minutes after the game (hear login sound) Are they kidding is this some twisted form of riot giving the middle finger to anyone who was on for that period of time...... It hits me right in the gut that the second stuff like that happens they dont put the breaks on ranked games seriously we may not be the many but those effected do suffer more than they seem to know. Yes i am mad right now and will i have people saying league does their best and bashing back probably. But the concern needs to be voiced.
All I did was enter a incorrect password, it gave me a password error, then typed correct one and I signed in.

GIVE THIS MAN A COOKIE PLEASE THIS GUY IS A GOT
> [{quoted}](name=DroopyToast,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fjM0ZPRv,comment-id=0022,timestamp=2015-10-06T01:03:14.481+0000)
>
> All I did was enter a incorrect password, it gave me a password error, then typed correct one and I signed in.

This man deserves a cookie{{item:2010}}  thank you so much..... I can finallly play
Hey, can you fix the login issue. I know you are working on it but..I would like to play tonight..thanks again.
Flushing DNS also worked for my roommate.  Same ISP, obviously, but it got him into the queue nonetheless.  We're both IT pros so I don't think it's a coincidence, it's a viable solution.

Confirmed! Flushing my DNS worked as well. Using Comcast in Alabama.
--Be sure to restart your client--
doesn't work for me. flushed my DNS and I still can't login. I am on AT&T though.
WinXP, same issue, and the only thing that's changed recently on my end is Adobe Flash Player needed an update.

I'm able to log in now. Time to see if I can go into ARAM.
Got all the way to the loading screen, though typing anything in lobby chat was very laggy.
Game was fine, but Quinn is still useless cause blind only works half the time it's supposed to.
Same I can't log in. I don't have Windows 10 and nothing has been changed on my computer recently.
i cant login.... saids attempt to connect, failed.. 3 times. what is going on.
hell i cant even get the patch to open so yeah....i dont even get to where it tries cant even patch after uninstalling and reenstalling
Let me on. Good luck guys.

Logged in to inform everyone to try Flushing your DNS.
I'm a Windows 10 user but it should apply to all Windows users.
Open Command Prompt, type “ipconfig /flushdns” (without the quotes).
You should receive a message of your success as confirmation when the cache is cleared.
Happy Leaguing everyone!

* flushed the dns
* restarted the client
* entered the incorrect password
*  told the pwd was incorrect
* entered correct pwd
* in queue, over 20000 ~ 8 min

p.s. Comcast sucks balls ... like pentakill Balls.  Can't get better than 12mbps on CL though. :(  Stuck with Crapcast.
Hey I got in the 20 min que! Fingers crossed boys
ranked game better not count or hell hath no fury >.> not like i can do anything but none the less losses should be forgiven for issues like this
And im sitting here trying to reconnect to ranked like thankyou league thankyou.......
#butthurtwestcoast  I are so mad I ddos their login server!
come on rito... dns flush does not work for me.
Flushing DNS worked for me aswell!
DNS flush and client restart worked for me too. Thanks for the guys that mentioned this.
Are you serious I didn't get a loss prevented through this whole thing? Come on I couldn't log back in and that was my promo game...

Same here. Started a ranked game then client crashed. So I had to re-login. But it won't let me log in, I missed the first 10 min of the game.  Lost the game, demoted, NOT even loss prevented. Please fix this.

There is a login queue for me, saying there is an unusually large number of people logging in.
My position in queue is over 20000; have to wait for 6+ mins.

EDIT: I am able to login now :D

Hey, I was having the same issue, so I kept trying to log on while watching netflix, it just started working. Not sure if it was because i tried like 5 times, or because it's fixed. But you're certainly not alone.
Flushing DNS worked for me.
Win8.1 here I don't think it's an OS issue, it's probably server side

I'm also having this issue. Make three passes at trying to log in then says the server can't be reached.

Only thing I can think of that's changed with my computer is that I did the dreaded update to Windows 10 recently, but I'm pretty sure I've been on League since then.

Edit:  coming from a tech support background it'd def be helpful to the Riot people if we can list what OS we are running on. It's known that Win 10 and LoL can play together poorly, so if we're all on that, that may be the issue right there.

I am not on Windows 10, I refuse to upgrade since they didn't specify how long they will support it without paying.  Windows 8.1 here.

Same thing 3 tries then same message.  Fear not, it's their login server, either ddos or software/hardware (or pathing too i guess)
Loss prevented please, I am in my promos when this happened
I have not updated to Windows 10. Currently using 8 problem still exists.

Your version of windows has nothing to do with it, neither will it help restarting your computer.  IMHO it's either a ddos attack on the login server, or simply something went wrong with the hardware or software to the login server.
Ddos?  Strange, that or just login server crash....  Waiting impatiently <3
I'm on a mac and can't login. No system changes since the last time I was able to play.
Yup.
SAME HERE, CANT LOG IN AFTER RESTARTING MY COMPUTER STILL DOESNT WORK. HEL{P}****************
Same issue here
Can´t login team.   :(

Same issue here, already playing on windows 10 for a long time, so can't be it.
This is happening to me aswell.. ):

Same, keeps disconnecting, have reset modem and computer still nothing.

Yeah I'm on Win's 10 myself (Which has wrecked my pc)
Can't log in. "Did not receive a response from the server" "The login server did not respond".
